title: Raven's Defense
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship repels a gnoll attack
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship defends Raven's Hold against attacking gnolls and a bat-like demon, successfully repelling them.
Kenzo uses his ki to join the battle outside the gates, leading to a tough fight but eventual victory over the gnolls.
Seeker and Kenzo tend to the wild animals penned in the stables, learning they were captured and left starving.
Wellby and Riswynn explore the barracks, finding signs of gnoll habitation and previous hobgoblin occupation with valuable items.
The party regroups to discuss their next steps after securing Raven's Hold and dealing with the aftermath of the battle.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship successfully defends Raven's Hold from a gnoll invasion and discovers neglected animals and valuable items in the aftermath.
